item.title: Malay receives excellence in teaching award
item.description:
University of Alabama, Birmingiham (UAB) has conferred the “excellence accomplishments in teaching” award to Malay for the year 2020. Malay currently teaches two very highly-rated courses at UAB.

More informaiton can be found here.
